#Ex01
```{r ex01}
library(expm)
#build the transition matrix
dim=6
diagonalValue=0.5
offDiagonalValue=0.25
P=diag(diagonalValue, dim, dim)


for (row in 1:dim) {
  for (col in 1:dim) {
    if (row==col + 1 || col == row + 1 ) {
      P[row,col]=0.25
    }  
  }
}
#special cases
P[1,2] = diagonalValue
P[6,5] = diagonalValue
#starting vector
val=1/dim
start=rep(val,dim)
#compute stationary state:

final=start %*% (P %^% 10)
print(final)  


```
